ygData.subject: Looking 4: Hardcore gamers that live the life of EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Everyone, Thanks for taking the time to read this post. I m working on a new show for VH1 entitled My Obsession It focuses on pop-culture and it s
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Everyone,

Thanks for taking the time to read this post. I'm working on a new
show for VH1 entitled "My Obsession" It focuses on pop-culture and
it's effects on society, people, etc. We are working on a segment
that highlights people submerged in the world of Everquest, and I'm
looking for possible candidates for the show. Our ideal person would
be someone who plays the game continuously/excessively and has
encountered problems be it family or friends due to their EQ habits.

Side note: This is not meant to be an Everquest "bashing"
story as so many from the past have been.

Thanks,

Reg
